rules_text:
First strike
[i]Chon'sin Mercenary[/i] – Spells and abilities you control that target creatures cost {2} less to cast or activate. This ability cannot reduce the mana in that cost to less than {1}.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Lon'Qu deals combat damage to a player, exile up to one target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.
